Querys.query: CREATE TABLE employee( employeeID varchar(10) not null, employeeName varchar(20), designation varchar(15), faculty varchar(15), department varchar(15), address varchar(50), qualifications varchar(20), gender varchar(10) DEFAULT 'Male', primary key (employeeID) )
insert into ticket (title, description, priority,Impact,OperatCat,client_id) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?) ;
update Ticket as d set e.employeeName = ?, e.designation = ?, e.faculty = ?, e.department = ?, e.add = ?, e.qualifications = ?, e.gender = ? where e.employeeID = ?
select t.tid from Ticket as t
